title: Remove fake tip element from page

requirements.summary: Remove or hide the unwanted tip/notification element that displays fake content
acceptanceCriteria: The tip element identified by the XPath is no longer visible on the page
No fake content displays in that location
The removal does not break the layout or functionality of surrounding elements

file_operations.description: Locate and remove or hide the tip/notification span element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1]. This element is within the main lobby content area, likely in the room grid section. Add conditional rendering or remove the element entirely to prevent display of fake or unwanted content. Ensure the removal does not affect surrounding room cards or grid layout.
